Materia.GetAll: SELECT materia_na, materia_de FROM materia ORDER BY materia_na
Materia.Search: SELECT materia_na, materia_de FROM materia WHERE materia_na LIKE @SearchTerm OR materia_de LIKE @SearchTerm ORDER BY materia_na
Materia.Exists: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM materia WHERE materia_na = @Nombre
Materia.Update: UPDATE materia SET materia_na = @Nombre, materia_de = @Descripcion WHERE materia_na = @NombreOriginal

Curso.GetAll: SELECT curso_id AS Id_curso, seccion_id AS Seccion_id, materia_na, persona_id AS Profesor_id FROM curso ORDER BY curso_id
Curso.GetAllComplete: SELECT c.curso_id AS Id_curso, c.seccion_id AS Seccion_id, s.seccion_de, c.materia_na, m.materia_de, c.persona_id AS Persona_id, p.persona_no AS Profesor_nombre FROM curso c INNER JOIN seccion s ON c.seccion_id = s.seccion_id INNER JOIN materia m ON c.materia_na = m.materia_na INNER JOIN persona p ON c.persona_id = p.persona_id ORDER BY c.curso_id
Curso.SelectById: SELECT curso_id AS Id_curso, seccion_id AS Seccion_id, materia_na, persona_id AS Profesor_id FROM curso WHERE curso_id = @Id
Curso.SelectByIdComplete: SELECT c.curso_id AS Id_curso, c.seccion_id AS Seccion_id, s.seccion_de, c.materia_na, m.materia_de, c.persona_id AS Persona_id, p.persona_no AS Profesor_nombre FROM curso c INNER JOIN seccion s ON c.seccion_id = s.seccion_id INNER JOIN materia m ON c.materia_na = m.materia_na INNER JOIN persona p ON c.persona_id = p.persona_id WHERE c.curso_id = @Id
Curso.Insert: INSERT INTO curso (seccion_id, materia_na, persona_id) VALUES (@seccion_id, @materia_na, @persona_id) RETURNING curso_id
Curso.ExistsById: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM curso WHERE curso_id = @Id
Curso.ExistsByComponents: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM curso WHERE seccion_id = @SeccionId AND materia_na = @MateriaNombre AND persona_id = @ProfesorId
Curso.Update: UPDATE curso SET seccion_id = @SeccionId, materia_na = @MateriaNombre, persona_id = @ProfesorId WHERE curso_id = @Id
Curso.CheckDependencies: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM inscripcion WHERE curso_id = @Id
Curso.Search: SELECT c.curso_id AS Id_curso, c.seccion_id AS Seccion_id, s.seccion_de, c.materia_na, m.materia_de, c.persona_id AS Persona_id, p.persona_no AS Profesor_nombre FROM curso c INNER JOIN seccion s ON c.seccion_id = s.seccion_id INNER JOIN materia m ON c.materia_na = m.materia_na INNER JOIN persona p ON c.persona_id = p.persona_id WHERE c.curso_id::TEXT LIKE @SearchTerm OR s.seccion_de LIKE @SearchTerm OR m.materia_na LIKE @SearchTerm OR m.materia_de LIKE @SearchTerm OR p.persona_no LIKE @SearchTerm ORDER BY c.curso_id
Curso.Exists: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM curso WHERE seccion_id = @SeccionId AND materia_na = @MateriaNombre

Nota.GetAllByCurso: SELECT i.inscripcion_id AS Codigo, m.materia_na AS Curso, s.seccion_de AS Seccion, p.persona_no AS Alumno, p.persona_id AS PersonaId, c.calificacion_no AS Nota FROM inscripcion i INNER JOIN curso cu ON i.curso_id = cu.curso_id INNER JOIN materia m ON cu.materia_na = m.materia_na INNER JOIN seccion s ON cu.seccion_id = s.seccion_id INNER JOIN persona p ON i.persona_id = p.persona_id LEFT JOIN calificacion c ON c.inscripcion_id = i.inscripcion_id WHERE cu.curso_id = @CursoId ORDER BY p.persona_no
Nota.GetAllByCursoAndCedula: SELECT i.inscripcion_id AS Codigo, m.materia_na AS Curso, s.seccion_de AS Seccion, p.persona_no AS Alumno, p.persona_id AS PersonaId, c.calificacion_no AS Nota FROM inscripcion i INNER JOIN curso cu ON i.curso_id = cu.curso_id INNER JOIN materia m ON cu.materia_na = m.materia_na INNER JOIN seccion s ON cu.seccion_id = s.seccion_id INNER JOIN persona p ON i.persona_id = p.persona_id LEFT JOIN calificacion c ON c.inscripcion_id = i.inscripcion_id WHERE cu.curso_id = @CursoId AND p.persona_no ILIKE @Nombre ORDER BY p.persona_no
Nota.Update: UPDATE calificacion SET calificacion_no = @Nota WHERE inscripcion_id = @InscripcionId

Seccion.Exists: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM seccion WHERE seccion_id = @Id OR seccion_de = @Nombre
Seccion.GetAll: SELECT seccion_id, seccion_de FROM seccion ORDER BY seccion_id
Seccion.Update: UPDATE seccion SET seccion_de = @Nombre WHERE seccion_id = @Id

Persona.Insert: INSERT INTO persona (persona_no, tipo_persona_id) VALUES (@Nombre, @TipoPersonaId) RETURNING persona_id
Persona.ExistsByName: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM persona WHERE persona_no = @Nombre
Persona.SelectAll: SELECT p.persona_id, p.persona_no, tp.tipo_persona_de FROM persona p INNER JOIN tipo_persona tp ON p.tipo_persona_id = tp.tipo_persona_id ORDER BY p.persona_no
Persona.SelectProfesores: SELECT persona_id AS Persona_id, persona_no AS Persona_no FROM persona WHERE tipo_persona_id = 2 ORDER BY persona_no
Persona.ExistsById: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM persona WHERE persona_id = @Id
Persona.GetById: SELECT persona_id AS Persona_id, persona_no AS Persona_no FROM persona WHERE persona_id = @Id
Persona.Update: UPDATE persona SET persona_id = @NuevoId, persona_no = @Nombre, tipo_persona_id = @TipoPersonaId WHERE persona_id = @IdOriginal
Persona.CheckDependencies: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM curso WHERE persona_id = @Id) + (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM inscripcion WHERE persona_id = @Id) AS total_dependencias

TipoPersona.GetAll: SELECT tipo_persona_id, tipo_persona_de FROM tipo_persona WHERE tipo_persona_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY tipo_persona_id
TipoPersona.GetById: SELECT tipo_persona_id, tipo_persona_de FROM tipo_persona WHERE tipo_persona_id = @Id
